name: ogemle
description: Random video chat prototype with WebRTC + WebSockets

scripts.dev: concurrently -c auto "pnpm --filter ogemle-server dev" "pnpm --filter ogemle-client dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter ogemle-server build && pnpm --filter ogemle-client build
scripts.start: concurrently -c auto "pnpm --filter ogemle-server start" "pnpm --filter ogemle-client preview -- --host"
